seo__page__description: RSM Design communicates the authenticity of a project’s unique message in a way that adds meaning and brings value to the team’s purpose. RSM Design designs high quality and successful brands that instill trust and build brand loyalty.
grid__image__description: Wolf logo mark mockup in gold foil on a black background
overview:
The visual essence of what a project represents

RSM Design creates brands that reflects the spirit
team__leaders: and the people that make it whole. A logo is the visual symbol or typography that represents a place and logo marks are helpful in establishing connectivity between large mixed-use developments. Branded experiences are thoughtful unique values that convey the character authentically through font
related__articles:
graphics & color. We believe in beginning with the end in mind to craft a connection the target audience will feel. Visual identities breathe soul and personality to attract and reach their audiences in an effective and mutually beneficial way.

RSM Design specializes in the transition of logo development into a branded physical environment. We design beyond the two-dimensional realm and into a layered architectural experience that carries the brand vision. Our studio designs with a holistic lens to create living branded environments for the way people interact with the places we inhabit.

Donors provide many people the opportunity to experience cultural projects through their involvement
sub__services__truncated:
direction and financial support. RSM Design understands recognizing donors is important for several reasons. It's a special opportunity to educate and impact in ways that dynamically integrate with the surroundings. Art installations and digital integration are two experiential ways of embedding another layer of meaning into a donor recognition wall.

We create donor recognition installations and programs that are both sensitive to the context and impactful to the visitors. Donor signage should honor the past & present while inspiring the future. The ultimate goal is to enhance the visitor's experience while paying homage to those who donated.

Art Programs and Community Landmarks that Connect People to Place

Placemaking design connects people to places through the use of synergistic design elements that suggest use and create collaboration between people. Graphics
default__sort: and color are used to lets visitors know they've arrived. Public art serves as a powerful tool to welcome visitation

RSM Design develops graphic & architectural elements that add to place and tell a story. It’s important to pull from the local community in order to connect their values with the environmental graphics. We work with artists to curate memorable moments and photo op landmarks. Placemaking is the sophisticated pathway to the design and planning of public spaces.

short__name___home__page: and interactive designs with art programming and guidelines that infuse character to the built environment. We work with the team including the developer
team__leaders: Blue public mural art at LBX in Long Beach
column24:
murals & sculpture makes places memorable

RSM Design creates & curates artful moments of delight through public art
column26:
and interactive designs. We work with the consultant team to develop design programs that compliment the art elements for an engaging environment.

We are tasked with creating graphic murals as well as establishing guidelines for curated commissioned art from local artists or international professionals. These guidelines establish the look & feel of potential mural art or public sculpture. Many of our projects feature delightful and surprisingly fun interactive art that adds action to an otherwise static element. A brightly colored wall or community created mural can have a large impact with low cost. These public artworks often become Instagram opportunities which drive traffic to the project.

Read more in our article: Using Public Art to Add Value to Projects

seo__page__description: Wayfinding signage design combines signage and map design
name___view__more__button: and typography to effectively navigate people through a space. Especially important in built environments
name___filter__button: wayfinding design provides the visual cues to help guide people to their destinations.
sub__services__truncated: Wayfinding signage & directional map at the Dallas Cowboys new training facilities named The Star.
related__articles:
Navigating People Through Place

Wayfinding design combines signage and map design
column24: and typography to effectively navigate people through a space. Especially important in built environments
column25:
wayfinding design provides the visual cues to help guide people to their destinations with ease. We work in close collaboration with the key stakeholders and other design consultants on each project. RSM Design is able to design visual wayfinding systems that carries a projects brand voice.

We identify wayfinding signage as vehicular or pedestrian and start with flow of traffic analysis to explore how people will move through cities and into places. After intensive research a rigorous design process is studied from varying perspectives to create a comprehensive wayfinding signage system that can serve the community and stand the test of time.

Read more in our article: What is Wayfinding?
